Yenepoya Institute of Technology (YIT), Mangalore, Karnataka is a private institute providing quality technical education in a few verticals of engineering degree. The college started operating from the year 2008 and is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum, approved by AICTE India, New Delhi. The institute is located in Moodabidri, Mangalore, Karnataka and spans across 15 acres of lush green land. The institute offers a 4-year degree course in engineering across 5 disciplines. Admissions to this course are entrance-based and admission form along with brochure is available in the institute official website.

International School of Engineering (INSOFE), Bangalore, Karnataka is an Applied Engineering school with an area of focus in Data science/ Big data analytics. It is a private institution that won the Education Leadership award in 2017. INSOFE also has branches in Hyderabad and Mumbai. INSOFE provides courses at Certificate, Bachelors, masters and Doctorate level. A well maintained IT-infrastructure is provided that covers all the amenities required by the students.

College_Summary: Geetha Shishu Shikshana Sangha Institute of Engineering & Technology for Women is located in Mysore and has been accredited with GRADE “A” by the National Accreditation Assessment Committee (NAAC). GSSSIETW offers 6 B.E Programs in Engineering viz., Electronics and Communication Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Information Science Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science branches and M. Tech Programs in Digital Communication and Networking, Computer Science Engineering and MBA program, all affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagaum.

College_Summary: Karavali Institute of Technology (KIT) is a premier institute established by the G R Education Trust is situated in picturesque region at Mangalore, Karnataka. It is part of academic excellence after the establishment and success of Karavali Group of Colleges, started in year 1996. It is located in the area of 32 acres of land. The Institute is located at Neermarga, Mangalore. KIT is an institution that makes learning a focused, fruitful, and enjoyable experience for all its students.

College_Name: Seshadripuram Academy of Business Studies - [SABS], Bangalore

College_Summary: Amity Global Business School (AGBS), Bangalore, one of the 10 campuses of Amity Global Business School, comes under the aegis of Amity Education Group. AGBS has been ranked No. 1 Not-For-Profit Private University in India by ndia Today. The institute offers PG degree courses in the discipline of Management and Business Administration. AGBS Bangalore offers a 2 year integrated PGPM+MBA and a 3 year GDPA+BBA course in partnership with Amity University. Admission will be based on percentage in the qualifying Aptitude Exam, Group Discussion and Personal Interview. Amity Global Business School, Bangalore is accepting applications for the 2022 academic year. Candidates can apply to the institute via their official website.

College_Summary: Stock Market Institute also called SMI in Karnataka, Bangalore was established in 2009. It is one of the best training institutes to learn to trade. This college offers postgraduate, diploma, and certificate courses namely MBA + PDCM, Professional Diploma in Capital Markets, Certification Course in Foundation of Capital Market, and Master Trader Program. The admission is done based on merit. Application mode is online. The institute assures a 99.99% placement every year.

College_Summary: Akshaya Institute of Technology, Tumkur was established in 2003 under Akshaya Education Trust. It is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum. It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and recognised by Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Karnataka. The mission of the institute is to provide an experience that inspires students to reach the highest level of accomplishment and personal growth throughout their lives. The vision of the college is to inculcate ethical, moral and spiritual values in education and to impart quality education to rural mass.
